txt.en: Nimithil can be found in Ost Anglebed in north-central Lebennin.\n\nYou have defeated the Haradrim sorcerer, Luruyak, and should now report your success to Nimithil.
Talk to Nimithil in Ost Anglebed
Roving Threat: Luruyak, Terror of Harad
After arriving with the forces at Hata Kebir, Luruyak has wandered Lebennin and sows destruction in his wake.
'I am glad to hear that Luruyak will trouble my people no longer, [placeholder].\n\n'Here, I have had a suitable reward prepared for you.'
Luruyak can be found somewhere in Lebennin.\n\nNimithil has asked you to track and defeat the Haradrim sorcerer, Luruyak.

'I have heard rumblings of a vile sorcerer of Harad who can call forth grim spirits.

'True or not, he might soon rally more to his cause and soon the Haradrim could find their morale bolstered.

'If you and your fellows can discover his whereabouts, I ask that you defeat him swiftly. Let us not allow him time to prove his claims!'
